com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth

Class HttpAuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.DecoratingService<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.SimpleDecoratingService<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth.HttpAuthService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public abstract class HttpAuthService
extends SimpleDecoratingService<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
    A DecoratingService that provides HTTP authorization functionality.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected HttpAuthService(Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse> delegate)
      Creates a new instance that provides HTTP authorization functionality to delegate.

        @SafeVarargs
public static Function<Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>,HttpAuthService> newDecorator(Authorizer<HttpRequest>... authorizers)
        Creates a new HTTP authorization Service decorator using the specified Authorizers.
        Parameters:
        authorizers - the array of Authorizers.

      • authorize

        protected abstract CompletionStage<Boolean> authorize(HttpRequest request,
                                                      ServiceRequestContext ctx)
        Determine if request is authorized for this service. If the result resolves to true, the request is authorized, or false otherwise. If the future resolves exceptionally, the request will not be authorized.

      • onSuccess

        protected HttpResponse onSuccess(ServiceRequestContext ctx,
                                 HttpRequest req)
                          throws Exception
        Invoked when req is successful. By default, this method delegates the specified req to the DecoratingService.delegate() of this service.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onFailure

        protected HttpResponse onFailure(ServiceRequestContext ctx,
                                 HttpRequest req,
                                 @Nullable
                                 Throwable cause)
                          throws Exception
        Invoked when req is failed. By default, this method responds with the HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED status.
        Throws:
        Exception
